item.title: Sylvia add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "I dare do all that may become a man; Who dares do more, is none" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Sylvia add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I meant what I said and I said what I meant. An elephant's faithful one-hundred percent!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sylvia add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "When the first baby laughed for the first time, its laugh broke into a thousand pieces, and they all went skipping about, and that was the beginning of fairies." -- J.M. Barrie
